actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to amend Rule XLVIII of the Rules of the House to increase the size of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence.

summary.text: Amends rule XLVIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to increase the size of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence from 14 to not more than 16 members.

titles.title: A resolution to amend Rule XLVIII of the Rules of the House to increase the size of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence.
